weapon.name: Fists
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Deal 1 Minor Bludgeoning Damage.

weapon.name: Stun Blaster
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Roll a d6, if the result is higher than the target HP, apply the unconscious condition. On a failure deal 1d6 Stun Damage.

weapon.name: Junker
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Deal 1d6 Slashing Damage and apply the bleeding condition.

weapon.name: Flintlock
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Deal 3d6 Slashing Damage, but the weapon malfunctions.

weapon.name: .66 Blaster
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Gain 1 Prowess on the attack, deal 2d6 Laser Damage.

weapon.name: .33 Crankshot
weapon.basic: [2 - SP]: Deal 1 Laser Damage, and roll a d6. If the result is 3+ deal an additional Laser damage. This action repeats until the roll fails.

weapon.name: .33 Gauss Revolver
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Roll a d6, on a 4+ deal 6 Laser Damage. On a failure deal 1d6 Laser Damage.
weapon.crit: Laser bounces to a hostile target within 15 ft of the original target dealing 1d6 Laser Damage.

weapon.name: .66 Gauss Revolver
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Deal 2d6 Laser Damage and roll a d6, on a 5+ the shot will bounce and hit an additional creature 15ft from the target. This effect will continue until a 5+ is not rolled.

weapon.name: .66 Repeater
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Make an attack against up to 2 targets, deal 1d6+2 Laser Damage split between targets.

weapon.name: .66 Sharpshooter
weapon.special: [4 - SP]: Gain 1 Prowess on the attack, deal 2d6+2 Laser Damage.

weapon.name: .99 Sharpshooter
weapon.special: [5 - SP]: Ignore cover bonuses and deal 3d6+2 Laser Damage.

weapon.name: .33 Splitter
weapon.special: Special [3 - SP]: Deal 1d6 Laser Damage and push the target back 10 ft.

weapon.name: .66 Splitter
weapon.special: Special [4 - SP]: Deal 2d6 Laser Damage.

weapon.name: Annhilaser
weapon.crit: Weapon automatically reloads at no SP cost.

weapon.name: Plasma Spewer
weapon.special: [2 - SP]: Deal 1d6+2 Burn Damage to a target within 30 ft from you.

weapon.name: HV-PB
weapon.basic: [5 - SP]: All targets in a 15 ft radius of the target must make an Agility Check of 4+ or take 6d6 Laser damage.
weapon.crit: Deal 1d6 Burn Damage to all damaged targets within 15 ft of the blast.

weapon.name: Compound Bow
weapon.special: [4 - SP]: Gain 2 Prowess on the attack, and deal 2d6 Slashing Damage.

weapon.name: Energy Bow
weapon.basic: [2 - SP]: Hold the attack, and increase the damage by 1d6.
weapon.special: [4 - SP]: Fire the weapon and unleash the held damage. If no damage is held, deal 1d6 Laser Damage.

weapon.name: Saw Launcher
weapon.special: [4 - SP]: Deal 2d6 Laser Damage and roll a d6, on a 5+ the shot will bounce and hit an additional creature 15ft from the target. This effect will continue until a 5+ is not rolled.

weapon.name: Neuro-Bolt
weapon.basic: [1 - SP]: Lock onto a target. This resets at the end of your turn. You may lock onto the same target multiple times.
weapon.special: [2 - SP]: Deal 1d6 Laser Damage for each locked target.
weapon.crit: Double damage result for each locked target.

weapon.name: Dagger
weapon.special: [2 - SP]: Deal 2d6 Slashing Damage.

weapon.name: Steel Knuckles
weapon.crit: Apply the Brittle Condition until the end of your next turn.

weapon.name: Stun Stick
weapon.special: [2 - SP]: Deal 2d6 Stun Damage.
weapon.crit: If the creature has fewer HP than damage result, apply the unconscious condition.

weapon.name: Crowbar
weapon.crit: Apply the Crippled Condition until the end of your next turn.

weapon.name: Claw Gauntlet
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Roll a d6, on a 4+ deal 6 Slashing Damage. On a failure, deal no damage.
weapon.crit: Apply the Bleeding Condition to the target.

weapon.name: Pole
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Deal 2d6+2 Bludgeoning Damage.

weapon.name: Spear
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Deal 2d6+2 Slashing Damage.
weapon.crit: Target is Impaled and grappled by you.

weapon.name: Plasma Glaive
weapon.special: [3 - SP]: Ignore resistances and deal 3d6 Laser Damage.
